actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that loan guarantees in an economic development program shall be limited only by the availability of qualified applicants and limitations in appropriation Acts.

summary.text: Amends the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to limit business loan guarantees by the Secretary of Commerce in economic redevelopment programs only by the availability of qualified loan guarantee applicants and by limitations contained in appropriation Acts.

titles.title: A bill to provide that loan guarantees in an economic development program shall be limited only by the availability of qualified applicants and limitations in appropriation Acts.
